questions.question: What is the primary objective of setting up a healing space?
choices: To impress clients with elaborate decorations
To create a safe and comfortable environment
To showcase expensive sound healing instruments
To maximize the number of clients in a session
questions.answer: To create a safe and comfortable environment

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically a component of a sound healing session structure?
What does 'informed consent' mean in the context of sound healing?
choices: The client agrees to pay for the session
The practitioner informs the client about their qualifications
Agreement given by a client based on full disclosure of the nature of the treatment
The client consents to be recorded during the session
questions.answer: Agreement given by a client based on full disclosure of the nature of the treatment

questions.question: What are contraindications in sound healing?
choices: Conditions or factors that serve as a reason to withhold a certain treatment
questions.answer: Conditions or factors that serve as a reason to withhold a certain treatment

questions.question: Why is maintaining professional boundaries important in sound healing?
choices: To avoid physical contact with clients
To maintain a safe and ethical relationship
questions.answer: To maintain a safe and ethical relationship

questions.question: What is the purpose of the integration period in a sound healing session?
choices: To allow the practitioner to set up for the next client
To give the client time to process the experience
To discuss payment for the session
To teach the client how to use sound healing instruments
questions.answer: To give the client time to process the experience

questions.question: Which aspect of setting up a healing space is NOT mentioned in the lesson plan?
What is the recommended first step in a sound healing session structure?
What does confidentiality mean in the context of sound healing?
choices: Keeping the sound healing techniques secret
Not sharing client information with others
Using code words for different treatments
questions.answer: Not sharing client information with others

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical component of a sound healing session?
What is the purpose of the warm-up activity in the lesson plan?
choices: To center and prepare participants for the lesson
To assess students' knowledge of sound healing
questions.answer: To center and prepare participants for the lesson

questions.question: What type of music is recommended for the background during the warm-up activity?
What is the main goal of the 'Healing Space Setup' activity?
choices: To test students' interior design skills
To practice creating a conducive environment for healing
To compete for the best-looking space
To learn about different types of healing instruments
questions.answer: To practice creating a conducive environment for healing

questions.question: How long are students given to conduct a mini sound healing session in the production task?
What is the purpose of the observer feedback in the mini sound healing session activity?
choices: To provide constructive feedback for improvement
To decide who gets to lead the next session
To identify the most talented sound healer
questions.answer: To provide constructive feedback for improvement

questions.question: What is the word count requirement for the reflection homework assignment?
What is the focus of the reflection homework assignment?
choices: Different types of sound healing instruments
The history of sound healing in Timor-Leste

questions.question: How long should the sound healing session plan be in the homework assignment?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a required resource for the lesson?
What is the purpose of the Q&A session at the end of the lesson?
choices: To address any remaining questions or concerns
To introduce the next module's content
questions.answer: To address any remaining questions or concerns

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key vocabulary term in the lesson plan?
What is the recommended group size for the mini sound healing session practice?
What is the primary focus of Learning Unit 7 in the course syllabus?
choices: The science of sound and healing
Integrating sound healing in Timorese healthcare

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as an activity in Learning Unit 7 of the syllabus?
choices: Plan and conduct a mini sound healing session for peers
Discuss case studies and ethical scenarios
Both A and B are mentioned

questions.question: What is the purpose of including local Timorese traditions in the sound healing course?
choices: To replace modern sound healing techniques
To respect and incorporate local beliefs and practices
To compare the effectiveness of different healing methods
questions.answer: To respect and incorporate local beliefs and practices

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when adapting sound healing practices for Timor-Leste?
What is the recommended approach for community engagement in sound healing?
choices: Keeping practices secret within the course
Offering sound healing demonstrations at health fairs or community events
Avoiding interaction with local healthcare professionals
Charging high fees for community sessions
questions.answer: Offering sound healing demonstrations at health fairs or community events

questions.question: Which of the following is suggested as a way to gain practical experience in the course?
choices: Watching online videos of sound healing sessions
Reading academic papers on sound healing
Organizing sound healing sessions at local community centers
questions.answer: Organizing sound healing sessions at local community centers

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for integrating sound healing with existing healthcare practices in Timor-Leste?
choices: Replacing all traditional medical treatments with sound healing
Keeping sound healing separate from mainstream healthcare
Exploring ways to incorporate sound healing into existing practices
Focusing only on sound healing for mental health issues
questions.answer: Exploring ways to incorporate sound healing into existing practices

questions.question: What is emphasized regarding the use of local Timorese instruments in sound healing?
